long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing Teach w/ AI's Chrome Extension companion, designed to support educators in generating AI-powered lesson plans, Individualized Education Programs (IEPs), assessments, educational content, activities, and letters of recommendation. With the ability to seamlessly engage with Luna, our AI assistant, educators can enhance their workflow, all without having to switch applications or leave their current document.
